parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of the person being created

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: JSON Object specifying the values for the Person's custom fields created in the account, keys for the object are the 40-character hashes assigned for the respective custom fields

parameter.name: ownerId
parameter.description: ID of the user who will be marked as the owner of this person

parameter.name: organizationId
parameter.description: ID of the organization this person will belong to

parameter.name: emails
parameter.description: Email addresses (one or more) associated with the person

parameter.name: phoneNumbers
parameter.description: Phone numbers (one or more) associated with the person

parameter.name: visibility
parameter.description: Visibility of the person. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility, possible values are 0,1,2

parameter.name: addedTime
parameter.description: Optional creation date and time of the person in UTC, Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output
